body.content:
Good Day,

We are one of the world’s largest LOAN PROVIDERS and one of the world’s 
largest and safest institutions, we work with global investors and 
financial companies and aim in helping our clients achieve their dreams 
in loan programs with interest as low as 1.50% (1.92% APR). Loans for 
foreigners. Programs without income verification. Fixed and variable 
interest rate loans. Payment terms of 10, 15, 20 and 30 years. 
International Loan Consultants puts at your disposal 27 years of 
experience in the industry to maximize your investment and minimize your 
expenses.

However, there is an ongoing program currently offering 85% Non-Recourse 
Loan (NRL) with a BG Leased Monetization program for trade finance, 
constructions, credit enhancement, government funding, property 
investment and all-round range of fundings for a period of 10-years + 1 
year grace period with no prepayment penalties.

Let us know if you are interested in our services so as to provide you
with more information.

Regards,
John Howlett
Financial Consultant

header.subject: Are you interested in a loan? 100% Non-Recourse Loan Opportunity
